main event: Three lights were observed in the sky over Bakersfield, California on September 1, 1965.
interesting points: The lights were described as amber and appeared to be crossing the sky in an irregular fashion,The sighting lasted for a few minutes and involved three distinct lights,One of the lights seemed to pulsate and was the brightest among them,The colors of the lights included yellowish orange, red, and green,The Air Force concluded the sightings were probably due to aircraft.
sighted object: three amber lights in the sky
witness description: A civilian who reported seeing the lights and commented on their unusual behavior.
